summary: REQ-114 is not correctly implemented. The diff introduces global CSS changes and About-page biography overrides that alter text colors beyond the "What Sets Me Apart" InfoCards, and it also appears to apply black-text overrides to other pages/sections (e.g., Services/Portfolio/Contact per summaries), violating the requirement to scope changes only to those InfoCards on /about while keeping all other About text unchanged and avoiding side effects on other routes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Only the InfoCards in the "What Sets Me Apart" section on /about should render black text (title + description), while all other About page text (biography/body + headings) keeps existing colors, and no other routes are affected.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff explicitly forces the About biography/body text to pure white via global CSS overrides, which changes existing styling rather than keeping it unchanged. Additionally, the repository summaries indicate black text overrides were applied to other pages (Services/Portfolio/Contact), which violates the requirement that no other pages/routes have text color changes as a side-effect.

hallucinated_features.description: Force About page biography/body text (including strong/em/b/i) to pure white with !important.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-114 explicitly says the biography/body text must remain unchanged; forcing white text is an unrequested styling change outside the InfoCards.

hallucinated_features.description: Apply black text overrides to non-About pages/sections (e.g., Services grid, Portfolio header/filter/projects grid, Contact page header/main content).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-114 is limited to About page InfoCards in the "What Sets Me Apart" section and explicitly disallows side effects on other routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token and background readability changes (e.g., CSS variable palette changes, static waterfall background/overlay styles).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrains the work to a frontend-only styling adjustment scoped to About InfoCards; broad global theme/background changes are not requested and risk affecting other pages.
